item.title: TPG 和 Sanabil 牵头为沙特金融科技公司 Hala 筹资 1.57 亿美元
item.description: Hala 是一家总部位于沙特阿拉伯的金融科技公司，在中东地区早期初创企业有史以来最大的一轮融资中筹集了 1.57 亿美元。【原文：Hala, a Saudi Arabia-based fintech company, raised $157 million in one of the largest-ever funding rounds for an early-stage startup in the Middle East.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔敦促警惕通胀上行风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）表示，欧洲中央银行必须保持警惕，以应对通胀上行的危险。【原文：The European Central Bank must remain on alert to tackle upside dangers to inflation, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 印尼增加 10 亿美元大米援助和减税措施以刺激经济增长
item.description: 印度尼西亚今年将增加 16 万亿印尼盾（9.89 亿美元）的刺激措施，以保持东南亚最大经济体的增长。【原文：Indonesia will add 16 trillion rupiah ($989 million) in stimulus this year to maintain growth in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 中国在初步调查后认定英伟达违反反垄断法
item.description: 中国在完成初步调查后裁定英伟达公司违反了反垄断法，在敏感的贸易谈判中加大了对华盛顿的压力。【原文：China ruled that Nvidia Corp. violated anti-monopoly laws after concluding a preliminary investigation, ratcheting up the pressure on Washington during sensitive trade negotiations.】

item.title: ICG 为第二支欧洲基础设施基金融资 31.5 亿欧元
item.description: 资产管理公司 ICG Plc 为其第二支欧洲基础设施基金募集到 31.5 亿欧元（37 亿美元）的承付款，北美投资者对该地区投资机会的强劲需求为该基金提供了支持。【原文：Asset manager ICG Plc has raised €3.15 billion ($3.7 billion) of commitments for its second European infrastructure fund, supported by strong demand from North American investors eyeing investment opportunities in the region.】

item.title: 纸板箱启示录与美国经济状况
item.description:
纸箱出货量急剧下降。【原文：

Shipments of boxes are plunging.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：美国经济中的纸板箱启示录（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：美国经济中的纸板箱启示录（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: The Cardboard Boxpocalypse in the US Economy (Podcast)】

item.title: 满载俄罗斯原油的受制裁油轮驶近阿达尼港
item.description: 一艘载有俄罗斯石油的受制裁油轮已驶近阿达尼集团运营的印度港口，这可能是禁令生效后最后一批在该集团设施卸货的黑名单船只之一。【原文：A sanctioned tanker carrying Russian oil has neared an Indian port operated by Adani Group, and will likely be one of the last blacklisted vessels to unload at the conglomerate’s facilities after a ban took effect.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所集团启动区块链平台，供私募基金使用
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）推出了一个基于区块链的平台，该平台最初专注于私募基金，标志着该交易所运营商开始向数字资产领域进军。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group Plc has rolled out a blockchain-based platform initially focused on private funds, marking a push by the bourse operator into digital assets.】

item.title: 南非银行呼吁部长改变信贷法
item.description: 南非最高级别的银行业游说团体批评政府撤回了旨在帮助小企业获得贷款的《国家信贷法》修改提案。【原文：South Africa’s top banking lobby group criticized the government’s withdrawal of proposed changes to the National Credit Act that were meant to help small firms secure loans.】

item.title: 花旗银行任命新任新加坡国家主管
item.description: 花旗集团任命 Lee Lung Nien 为新加坡国家官员兼银行业务负责人，接替任职两年后即将离任的 Tibor Pandi。【原文：Citigroup Inc. appointed Lee Lung Nien as country officer and banking head for Singapore, taking over from Tibor Pandi who is leaving after two years in the role.】

item.title: 据说泰国将对黄金交易征税以减缓泰铢涨势
item.description: 泰国当局正在考虑对实物黄金交易征税，以减缓已威胁到出口和旅游业的泰国货币涨势。【原文：Thai authorities are considering a tax on physical gold trading to slow a rally in the nation’s currency that has threatened exports and tourism.】

item.title: Orsted 拟折价 67% 出售股票，融资 94 亿美元
item.description: Orsted A/S 计划以 67% 的折扣出售新股，因为这家海上风电开发商在押注美国市场出错后，正努力重建投资者的信心。【原文：Orsted A/S plans to sell new shares at a 67% discount as the offshore wind developer works to rebuild investor confidence after a bet on the US market went wrong.】

item.title: 小米加快旗舰智能手机发布步伐，欲与 iPhone 17 一较高下
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）将于本月发布下一款旗舰智能手机，并更新其品牌形象，以与苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Xiaomi Corp. will release its next flagship smartphone this month and update its branding in a measure to go head-to-head with Apple Inc. for a share of the premium smartphone market.】

item.title: 中国电池制造商因 "固态 "技术的发展前景而受益
item.description: 更强大的电动汽车电池有望在全球范围内投入使用--至少中国投资者是这么认为的。【原文：One of the great hopes for more powerful electric vehicle batteries is getting closer to hitting the world’s roads – at least according to Chinese investors.】

item.title: 德国假肢制造商奥托博克计划再次尝试 IPO
item.description: 骨科技术和假肢供应商奥托博克公司（Ottobock SE）计划今年在法兰克福进行首次公开募股，这将为欧洲新上市企业的试水浪潮添上浓墨重彩的一笔。【原文：Ottobock SE, a provider of orthopedic technology and prosthetics, is planning an initial public offering in Frankfurt this year, adding to a wave of companies testing the waters that could help boost Europe’s market for new listings.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数：英国股市将保持稳定，英镑走高
穆巴达拉公司以 8.58 亿美元出售阿联酋运营商 Du 的股份
item.description: 阿布扎比财富基金穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.PJSC 股份的交易中筹集了约 8.58 亿美元，此前的定价在计划范围的下限。【原文：Abu Dhabi wealth fund Mubadala Investment Co. raised about $858 million from the sale of a stake in Emirates Integrated Telecommunications Co. PJSC after pricing the deal at the lower end of a planned range.】

item.title: 南非央行新通胀目标面临关键考验
item.description: 本周，南非储备银行将通胀率锚定在 3% 的新目标将面临重大考验，它将面临两个关键数据点以及宣布此举以来的首次政策会议。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank’s new goal of anchoring inflation at 3% faces a big test this week, with two key data points and its first policy meeting since announcing the move.】

item.title: 新加坡房屋销售再掀狂潮，创九个月新高
item.description: 8 月份，新加坡新房销售量创下 9 个月以来的新高，这凸显了近期随着大量项目投放市场，市场需求再度回升。【原文：Singapore new home sales rose to their highest in nine months in August, underscoring a recent resurgence in demand as a slew of projects hit the market.】

item.title: 土耳其法院的一起重要案件将如何影响市场？
item.description: 土耳其的政治对峙可能在周一达到高潮，届时法院的一项裁决将威胁到主要反对党的生存以及这个拥有 8500 万人口国家的民主未来。【原文：A political standoff in Turkey may reach a climax on Monday, when a court ruling threatens the existence of the main opposition party — and the future of democracy in the country of 85 million people.】

item.title: 在美联储会议之前，铝制头盔创下一年内最长连胜纪录
item.description: 在本周美联储会议可能导致降息之前，铝连续第七个交易日攀升。【原文：Aluminum climbed for a seventh session ahead of this week’s Federal Reserve meeting, which could lead to an interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 英国能源价格暴涨的真正原因
item.description:
在本周的Merryn Talks Money节目中，牛津大学教授迪特尔-赫尔姆（Dieter Helm）讨论了他所说的净零的实际成本。【原文：

On this week’s Merryn Talks Money, Oxford University Professor Dieter Helm discusses what he says is the real cost of net zero.

】

item.title: 中国经济活动受挫令铁矿石前景黯淡
item.description: 由于中国 8 月份经济活动的放缓幅度超过预期，给需求前景蒙上阴影，铁矿石收窄了早些时候的跌幅并企稳。【原文：Iron ore pared earlier losses and steadied as China’s economic activity slowed more than expected in August, clouding the demand outlook.】

item.title: 英国央行的 Gilts 决定有可能给里夫斯带来 40 亿英镑的损失
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，如果英格兰银行在本周的一项关键决定中决定停止积极出售金边债券，那么她将需要再筹集 40 亿英镑（54 亿美元）的资金，以使预算重回正轨。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will need to find a further £4 billion ($5.4 billion) to put her budget back on track if the Bank of England decides to stop active gilt sales at a critical decision this week.】

item.title: 惠誉下调评级后法国债券期货走软
item.description: 法国 10 年期国债期货周一走低，交易商对惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）在近期政治动荡后下调法国国债评级做出了反应。【原文：French 10-year bond futures drifted lower on Monday as traders reacted to Fitch Ratings’ downgrade of the country following recent political turmoil.】

item.title: 亚洲股市继续反弹，收盘价创历史新高
item.description: 受美国关税不确定性缓解、中国股市强劲反弹以及对美联储最早可能在下周降息的乐观预期推动，亚洲股市延续涨势，收盘价创下历史新高。【原文：Asia’s equity benchmark headed for a record close, extending a rally fueled by easing uncertainties around US tariffs, a strong rebound in Chinese shares and optimism that the Federal Reserve may cut rates as early as next week.】

item.title: 精品投资银行 BDA 因并购困境裁减中国员工
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，BDA Partners 已裁减了上海的一些投资银行家，以应对中国日益激烈的竞争和交易的不确定性，这是最新一家从世界第二大经济体撤退的金融服务公司。【原文：BDA Partners has cut some investment bankers in Shanghai to cope with intensifying competition in China and uncertainty over deals, people familiar with the matter said, marking the latest financial services firm to retreat from the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 市值 1680 亿澳元的澳大利亚财富基金首席信息官辞职，转任 ADIC 职务
item.description: 澳大利亚 2,520 亿澳元（1,680 亿美元）主权财富基金投资总监本-萨米尔德（Ben Samild）已辞职，前往中东任职。【原文：Ben Samild, the investment chief of Australia’s A$252 billion ($168 billion) sovereign wealth fund, has resigned to take up a role in the Middle East.】

item.title: 监管机构放宽首次公开募股和外国投资者规则，印度市场情绪高涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
